tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE VideoFootageMetadata (
    video_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    camera_id INT,
    frame_number INT,
    person_id INT,
    detected_emotion VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE VideoFootageMetadata (
  video_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  camera_id UUID,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  people_count INT,
  flagged BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE FacialRecognition (
  face_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  video_id UUID,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  detected_emotion VARCHAR(50),
  detected_age INT,
  confidence FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (video_id) REFERENCES VideoFootageMetadata(video_id)
);

CREATE TABLE footage_metadata (
    footage_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    camera_id INT,
    video_length INTERVAL,
    resolution TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE facial_recognition (
    recognition_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    person_id UUID,
    footage_id UUID,
    recognition_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    result JSON
)

CREATE TABLE persons (
    person_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    birthdate DATE,
    gender TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE cameras (
    camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location TEXT,
    status TEXT,
    installation_date DATE,
    model TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE events (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type TEXT,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    footage_id UUID,
    camera_id INT
)
